abstract: AmeriGas Partners, the country's largest propane distributor, has agreed to buy the propane operations of Energy Transfer Partners in a cash-and-share deal worth $2.9 billion.
snippet: AmeriGas Partners, the country's largest propane distributor, has agreed to buy the propane operations of Energy Transfer Partners in a cash-and-share deal worth $2.9 billion.

headline.main: AmeriGas to Buy Energy Transfer Unit for $2.9 Billion
